original_text: Now the chief priests and the whole council were seeking false testimony against Jesus that they might put him to death,
korean_text: 대제사장들과 온 공회가 예수를 죽이려고 그를 칠 거짓 증거를 찾으매

sentences.original_text: Now the chief priests and the whole council
were seeking false testimony against Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 예수를 거슬러 거짓 증거를 찾고 있었으니

sentences.original_text: that they might put him to death
